content.rendered:
Photo by Minimography

This Week in Genesis (#34), beautiful new themes (from Web Savvy Marketing, Simple Pro Themes, Appfinite, WPStudio and more), beautiful websites in the showcase, Sridhar offers free memberships to the Genesis core community, and Rafal Tomal gets featured on Forbes.

Quite a happening week for the Genesis community overall!

Themes

Jessica, an e-commerce theme from Rebecca Gill and her team at Web Savvy Marketing, launched on the Studiopress theme store.

Look what just went live in the StudioPress store! https://t.co/zSekyxZDkE

— Rebecca Gill (@rebeccagill) January 20, 2016

Sunshine Pro, an easily customisable e-commerce theme by Simple Pro Themes…

Sunshine Pro theme now available – Get Set Creative – https://t.co/DhRZpi3Kcy #genesiswp #wordpress @BeaverBuilder pic.twitter.com/gQDJO2msUY

— Simple Pro Themes (@SimpleProThemes) January 18, 2016

…and Sunshine Pro theme is fully compatible with the Beaver Builder plugin as well.

How to use full width / blank @BeaverBuilder template on Sunshine Pro #genesiswp theme – https://t.co/DZBZGQaBml pic.twitter.com/arpZnPjxNN

— Simple Pro Themes (@SimpleProThemes) January 20, 2016

Appfinite launched the Elevate theme for bloggers, marketers and business professionals.

The “Elevate” Theme is now available for the Genesis Framework – https://t.co/4cmNjfPscr Let me know what you think! #genesiswp

— Wes Straham (@WesStraham) January 20, 2016

WPStudio launches the Forest theme.

Say hello to the new Genesis theme Forest, prestyled for WooCommerce https://t.co/w26Dmo8yyL #genesiswp #woocommerce pic.twitter.com/g3W2fGovGN

— WPStudio (@wpstudiowp) January 21, 2016

Sonia from Candies N Pixels launches Five. Congratulations on the first theme launch Sonia!

Five -Theme Launch https://t.co/1fWBtGJhFL #genesiswp #wordpress #childtheme #pintereststyled #genesischild

— Sonia (@CandiesnPixels) January 21, 2016

Showcase

A beautiful, minimalistic redesign from Ryan Townley, for his own site, ryantownley.com

Alright, alright, alright. Just launched my own site redesign: https://t.co/SvTieql1Et #genesiswp #minimalism pic.twitter.com/DegSl2Tb6m

— Ryan Townley (@ryantownley) January 18, 2016

And another beautiful design by Frank Schrijvers for his own site, WPStudio

Haven't been on my website lately? Check it out! I'm excited to show you the new design of WPStudio https://t.co/imPoT4PAvv #genesiswp

— WPStudio (@wpstudiowp) January 19, 2016

Carrie Koehmstedt from Carrie Loves redesigns her website on the Foodie Pro theme, carrieloves.com

Just updated my website & favorite Foodie theme by @shaybocks with #pantone #RoseQuartz colors – https://t.co/TpLHMkvjFq. #genesiswp

— carrie loves (@carrieloves) January 15, 2016

The awesome Shay Bocks launches four beautiful websites.

4 launches in 5 days and none of them food blogs. fun but insane. ready to get back to my foodie peeps. after sleep. must sleep first!

— Shay Bocks (@shaybocks) January 18, 2016

Conception to launch in 24 hours. #genesiswp https://t.co/f2pj5NOmdI Loving the personal projects this weekend! pic.twitter.com/J5ApJW5aAo

— Shay Bocks (@shaybocks) January 18, 2016

Where's the champagne? Launch #2 for the weekend just went LIVE!! #genesiswp #clientlove https://t.co/GVTdNcy7mC @AsYouWishVA

— Shay Bocks (@shaybocks) January 16, 2016

I am so tickled to launch this project today! https://t.co/OTA6rACaie #genesiswp

— Shay Bocks (@shaybocks) January 15, 2016

Thauna over at Bellano Studio launches a new website for the hypothyroidchef.com. Gotta say, it looks absolutely yummy.

Just launched a new site for @HypothyroidChef. Yummy recipes & great info. #genesiswp https://t.co/imZjbWzmJS pic.twitter.com/xyaqMMUbER

— Thauna (@BellanoStudio) January 21, 2016

Last one (couldn’t resist adding all the beautiful websites!): A beautiful, minimal e-commerce website from Bloom Blog Shop for trendychickadee.com (h/t Brian Gardner).

Absolutely stunning site design on Genesis — https://t.co/JaBfaMXvp5 #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/wdI3gheclL

— Brian Gardner (@bgardner) January 21, 2016

Podcasts

Carrie Dills holds a podcast on email marketing with Think Handy.

I’m LIVE with @thinkhandy, talking about email marketing! Tag your questions with #officefm https://t.co/FAC1f4KvUh

— Office Hours Podcast (@officehoursfm) January 21, 2016

Best of the rest

Bradley Potter has been busy making changes to the Themecore starter framework for Genesis.

ThemeCore is undergoing some changes. A more open look. https://t.co/fBvMlF4mSS – Will update on Github later today.

— Bradley Potter (@bradleypotter) January 18, 2016

Neil Gee – apologies – Wesley Cole – has launched Genesis snippets for the Atom Text Editor.

#Atom package for #GenesisWP snippets – https://t.co/qALTIVqSVu

— Neil Gee (@_neilgee) January 20, 2016

Another teaser of the Starter theme coming from Calvin Koepke.

I'm not sure whether to be proud or embarrassed that this is what I do for leisure. #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/Zh5XJnTx7g

— Calvin Koepke (@cjkoepke) January 16, 2016

Sridhar offers free membership to 20+ active members of the Genesis community, including GenesisWP.guide’s own Nick Davis! 😀

Thanking the #GenesisWP Community Contributors: https://t.co/yGo0qRj9PB

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) January 22, 2016

And the last one, Rafal Tomal’s blog makes it to the 25 Design blogs to follow in 2016 on Forbes!

Via @Forbes: 25 Promising Digital #Design Blogs to Follow in 2016 (includes @StudioPress' @RafalTomal) https://t.co/zl1RGgjppV #GenesisWP

— Sandee Jackson (@Sandee_Jackson) January 21, 2016

Lindsey Riel is putting up the price of her popular TADA! Workshop soon, so if you’ve been on the fence now might be the time to grab it!

Get it before the price goes up ? #WordPress #WebDesign https://t.co/DbCEdOfHSV pic.twitter.com/fQUTCSaLTO

— Lindsey Riel (@lindseyriel) January 19, 2016

And finally…

Huge congrats to GenesisWP.guide favourite Calvin Koepke on his latest addition.

Newborns are the most amazing humans. pic.twitter.com/ndIudi7G7e

— Calvin Koepke (@cjkoepke) January 19, 2016

We couldn’t be happier for you!

That’s all for today folks! This is my first time editing the Genesis WP Guide so let me know if I’ve missed anything in the comments below.

So many things happening in the community, makes me wonder what all I miss every week!

(Nick, thanks for letting me guest edit this edition. Makes me want to strive to be more active in the Genesis community 🙂

PS Next week look out for another new guest editor, Jason Vance who’ll be taking control!

excerpt.rendered: Awesome themes explosion, Sridhar Katakam offers free memberships to the Genesis core community, and Rafal Tomal gets featured on Forbes!
